course_description: Introduction to film theory concepts spanning from "classical theory" into the structuralist and post-structuralist era. Weekly screenings required.
prerequisites: FILM 102 and (FILM 201 or FILM 202 or FILM 203 or FILM 204) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
